name: Delphi Scintilla Interface Components
short_description: Components to make it easy to use the Scintilla Project (Syntax highlightning editor control) with Delphi/C++ Builder, define your own languages including styles/keywords etc. which are based on the (50+) lexers in SciLexer.Dll. Autocomplete etc.
